other_tests.findings: Normal generalised rod and cone system function, but a high incidence of generalised RPE dysfunction.
Identified several heterozygous variants in CTNNA1, deemed 'probably damaging' or 'disease-causing'.
Visual acuities varied among patients: 20/20, 20/30, 20/40, etc., reflecting different levels of visual disturbance.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Some patients showed changes over time, for instance, visual acuity of one patient decreased from 20/20 to 20/60 over eighteen years.

other_tests.findings: Noted abnormalities such as macular pigmentary changes and hyperpigmented lines.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Some abnormalities remained unchanged over time, while others showed progression, e.g., marked macular atrophy noted in one case.
